main event: A pilot reported seeing a strange craft-like object hovering over Cambridge City, Indiana in 1951.
interesting points: The object was described as shining silvery and approximately 30 to 40 feet in diameter., The pilot observed the object from about 500 feet above the ground., The craft was reported to have no visible means of propulsion and was rotating slowly., The object remained motionless for several minutes before accelerating straight up to an altitude of 15,000 feet., The incident was documented in the Project Blue Book, which was a government investigation into UFOs.
witness description: a pilot from the United States Army Air Forces
